item.description:
Celebrate the season with our holiday 5K course along the wide avenues of West Hartford, past festive shop windows and decorated neighborhoods. Start, finish and post race refreshments in Blue Back Square.

Please help benefit our neighbors in need through your donation of a pair (or two or three) of new mittens, gloves, hats or scarves when you come to the event. All items will be donated to “The Town That Cares Fund,” a program of the West Hartford Human Services Department.

We expect a large attendance - come early for parking and pickup. Last but not least, plan on having a fun run on race day.
item.name: Blue Back Square Mitten Run
